Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 (Close background apps such as internet browser)
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: This game needs all Windows updates installed, and is meant to be played on a 16:9 screen.

  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended.
